mdRecord.dcterms:title: Sowers Reunion and Capt. Bill Sowers 60th Wedding Anniversary
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The Sowers Reunion and Capt. Bill Sowers 60th Wedding Anniversary in 1927. The people included in the photograph are as follows: Standing left: Capt. Bill Sowers Rosa Sowers (wife) Johnnie Cronk(F) Chris Epperly (behind) Johnson Agnew Bird Bishop Ratliff Mallie Whitlock. Rear right: Payton Williams?, Rev. See, Claude Williams Hestle Sowers G
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Wedding anniversaries
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
